name: Sk Naiyer Hosain
review: Absolutely love the atmosphere here! The stylists are incredibly talented and the service is top-notch.

name: Goutam Mandal
review: The staffs here work very carefully and the style is very UNIQUE.

name: Nabanita Panigrahi
review: The ambiance of the salon is very calm & relaxing. Best salon in Contai I would say.

name: Sudip Jana
review: Great experience every time. The booking system is easy and the staff always remembers my preferences.

name: Sampurna Ghosh
review: In this price range, it is THE best I can say. With in this range no one can offer you this much. Went 3 times there, everytime they impress with different features.

name: Anindita Guha
review: Once you get into the salon, they treat you like a queen. They offer water, coffee as they know my nanoplastia gonna take long time.
